data.message: How do I get help for my son, his account was deactivated and the recovery process isn't working.

replies.message: Hey Linda. If your son's account was deactivated, he'll be able to reactivate it by logging in. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2m8AXiu. However, if your son's Facebook account has been disabled, he'll see a special message when he tries to log in. If this is the case, please have your son submit an appeal if he hasn't yet: http://bit.ly/2hhsELZ. We appreciate you and your son's patience as we review your appeal. -Elizabeth

Facebook thank you for the response! The form will not work for him, it says it doesn't belong to a disabled account. If he tries to resubmit it says it is not filled out the entire way. His email is jonnyhumes@gmail.com.
Can you help me too Facebook by messeging me back?
